paragraphs.text: Living in poverty as a widower and left to care for his son, Teo, he was blackmailed into building ingenious weapons for the Fire Nation. Despite the hardships he faced, he still maintained an eccentric persona and his inventions contributed significantly to the development of technology in the world.
